qas.question: Who invented the beer pump in England?
In what city was the beer pump invented?
In what country was John Lofting born?
What was the death year of John Lofting?

context: The first beer pump known in England is believed to have been invented by <a0_0>John Lofting<a0_0/> (b. <a2_0>Netherlands<a2_0/> <a4_0>1659<a4_0/>-d. Great Marlow Buckinghamshire <a3_0>1742<a3_0/>) an inventor, manufacturer and merchant of <a1_0>London<a1_0/>.
